item.description:
Continuing our White Tour de France, let's travel down the road from Chablis to the larger region of Burgundy!

I need volunteers to help purchase wines as I'm going to be unavailable the previous week. I have a villages appellation to start the list, but would like to get a range of other white Burgundies (perhaps even a Grand Cru or Premier Cru?).

Volunteers also needed to appetizers.
As always we'll split the cost of the wines amongst the attendees.

group.name: The MetroWest White Wine Meetup Group

item.name: May White Wine Tasting--Burgundy
